doc:
Robert Z'Dar https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Z%27Dar 0 Robert J. Zdarsky (June 3, 1950 – March 30, 2015), better known by his stage name Robert Z'Dar, was an American actor and film producer, best known for his role as officer Matt Cordell in the cult horror film Maniac Cop and its two sequels.Z'Dar worked mainly in low-budget B-movies and direct-to-video features, but occasionally in mainstream Hollywood films and television. Due to his cherubism, a medical condition resulting in an enlarged jawline, Z'dar had a unique and easily recognizable look with a slightly sinister appearance, which aided his career as he usually portrayed villains. A prolific actor, Z'Dar appeared in 121 films and television episodes over the course of his 29-year career. Robert_J._Zdarsky ( June_3_,_1950 – March_30_,_2015 ) , better_known by his_stage_name_Robert_Z'Dar , was an_American_actor_and_film_producer , best_known for his_role as officer_Matt_Cordell in the_cult_horror_film_Maniac_Cop and its_two_sequels.Z ' Dar worked mainly in low-budget_B-movies and direct-to-video_features , but occasionally in mainstream_Hollywood_films_and_television . Due to his_cherubism , a_medical_condition resulting in an_enlarged_jawline , Z'dar had a_unique_and_easily_recognizable_look with a_slightly_sinister_appearance , which aided his_career as he usually portrayed villains . A_prolific_actor , Z'Dar appeared in 121_films_and_television_episodes over the_course of his_29-year_career .
